span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.p: NEBSD will be closed for the rest of the school year. We will be continuing with our Continuity of Education Plan.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: The goal of the Continuity of Education Plan for the Northeast Bradford School District is to provide a framework of educational opportunities for students to maintain and develop skills while away from the customary school environment. Please click on the Northeast Bradford's Continuity of Education Plan to view the plan.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: If you are the parent or guardian of a District K-12 student who needs a Chromebook for learning at home, please contact our technology department at (570) 744-2521, ext. 2265/2049. If you have a computer and internet access at home to meet you child's online learning needs, we ask that you please reserve this program for those who do not.
Internet access points placed in strategic community locations are now available to our students and families. Access points are located:

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.p: As a reminder, please follow all social distancing guidelines as you access the Wi-Fi at these locations.
If you need help with google classroom, please refer to the linked document: Google Classroom

span.strong: If you need your password reset, please email:

div.p: The Department of Human Services has partnered with local agencies to provide a 24/7 helpline to assist you or your family in your time of need.
If you are feeling anxious or fearful during these stressful times you are not alone. Please call 1-855-284-2494
For click HERE for parent resources.
If you would like to be added to the delivery of meals, please contact Missy Boardman at 570-744-2521, ext. 2207 or by email at mboardman@nebpanthers.com
For current times and locations of prepared meal delivery please click HERE for details
